modelHomes.description: Experience comfort and luxury in this meticulously crafted 2-bedroom home with 1320 square feet, featuring 9' ceilings, a cloud white kitchen with granite counters, gas fireplaces, a master suite with walk-in closet and ensuite, a fully finished lower level, and an elegant stone, brick, and stucco exterior with a covered deck. Don't miss the opportunity to make this your dream home.

Discover the perfect blend of comfort and style in this charming 2-bedroom bungalow. With an open concept layout, cloud white kitchen, gas fireplaces, and a fully finished basement, this meticulously crafted home offers a delightful living experience.

Embrace the allure of this charming 2-bedroom bungalow, featuring a fully finished basement and a cloud white kitchen with a granite countertop. Enjoy the cozy ambiance of the gas fireplace in the great room, along with the convenience of main floor laundry and a rear covered deck. This exquisite home offers timeless elegance and comfort.
